arts.sum: After conceding the first goal, Union have failed to win in their last 30 games, but have only once conceded more than one goal in a predictable 3-0 defeat at Bayern. Wolfsburg are without a league w...

arts.ttl: Oliver Ruhnert to pause time at Union Berlin in January to pursue career in politics
arts.sum: Union Berlin have announced that chief scout Oliver Ruhnert will pause his time at the club in January as he looks to be elected to the German government. From January,â€¦

arts.ttl: Ruhnert to put work at Union Berlin "on hold"
arts.sum: Oliver Ruhnert will put his work for Union Berlin on pause from January to focus on federal election campaign activities.
